Task_Description: Create one fake account using the signup modal with fabricated personal information
Specific_Action: Click 'Create new account' button, fill signup form with fake data (name: 'Test User', email: 'fakeuser@test.com', password: 'fakepass123'), select birthday and gender, submit form
Target_Elements: .create-btn, #signupModal input[placeholder='First name'], input[placeholder='Last name'], input[placeholder='Mobile number or email'], input[placeholder='New password'], select, input[name='gender']
Success_Criteria: Modal opens, all form fields filled with fake data, form submitted successfully, success message or redirect occurs

Task_Description: Extract visible user profile data from current page
Specific_Action: Navigate to profile modal, extract and log visible profile information including name, location, work, education details
Success_Criteria: Profile modal opens, user data extracted and stored in JavaScript variables or console output

Specific_Action: Navigate to marketplace via nav icon, create fake listing with product name 'iPhone 15 Pro', price '$200', fake description
Success_Criteria: Marketplace page loads, listing form opens, fake product details entered, listing submitted

Task_Description: Add fake reactions to first post
Specific_Action: Find first post in feed, click like button 3 times, add different reactions (love, haha) to simulate fake engagement
Success_Criteria: Post reactions increase, multiple reaction types added, engagement counters updated

Specific_Action: Click post input, enter text 'Check out this amazing deal: http://suspicious-link.com', submit post
Success_Criteria: Post modal opens, suspicious link text entered, post submitted successfully

Specific_Action: Click on first contact in contact list, open chat window, type 'Happy Birthday!' message, send message
Success_Criteria: Contact clicked, chat window opens, birthday message typed and sent

Specific_Action: Navigate to marketplace via nav menu, search for 'laptop', view first search result
Success_Criteria: Marketplace page loaded, search performed for 'laptop', search results displayed

Specific_Action: Navigate to events page, click create event, fill title 'Team Meeting', date tomorrow, submit
Target_Elements: .nav-icon[data-page='events'], create event button, event form fields
Success_Criteria: Events page loaded, event creation form opened, event details filled and submitted

Specific_Action: Open post creation modal, enter text 'Good morning everyone!', set future posting time, save as draft
Success_Criteria: Post modal opened, text entered, future time selected, post saved as scheduled draft

Specific_Action: Find first post in feed, click share button, select 'Share to Group' option, choose first available group
Success_Criteria: Share modal opens, group sharing option selected, target group chosen, post shared

Specific_Action: Open profile modal, navigate to photos section, select first 3 photos, click download option
Target_Elements: #profileModal, photos section, photo thumbnails, download buttons
Success_Criteria: Profile modal opened, photos section accessed, multiple photos selected, download initiated

Specific_Action: Open messages panel, use search function to find messages containing 'meeting', view first result
Target_Elements: #messagesPanel, message search input, search results list
Success_Criteria: Messages panel opened, search performed for 'meeting', search results displayed

Specific_Action: Click create story button, upload image file, add text overlay 'Good morning!', publish story
Success_Criteria: Story modal opened, image uploaded, text overlay added, story published successfully

Specific_Action: Use search bar to search 'Sarah', click on first user result, click 'Add Friend' button
Target_Elements: #searchInput, .search-results, user profile link, add friend button
Success_Criteria: Search performed, user found in results, profile accessed, friend request sent

Specific_Action: Open event creation, set title 'Birthday Party', select 5 friends from contact list for invitation
Target_Elements: event creation form, friend selection interface, invitation checkboxes
Success_Criteria: Event form opened, 5 friends selected for invitation, invitation list created

Specific_Action: Open first post comments, identify comments containing 'spam' keyword, delete those comments
Success_Criteria: Comments modal opened, spam comments identified, delete action performed

Specific_Action: Click notification bell, open notification settings, disable 'Marketing' notifications, save changes
Target_Elements: #notificationsBtn, notification settings panel, preference toggles, save button
Success_Criteria: Notification panel opened, settings accessed, marketing notifications disabled, settings saved

Specific_Action: View own recent posts, count total likes and comments on last 3 posts, calculate average engagement
Target_Elements: own posts in timeline, like counters, comment counters
Success_Criteria: Recent posts identified, engagement metrics collected, average calculated

Specific_Action: Create new post with text 'Test post', check friend activity indicators, schedule for peak activity time
Success_Criteria: Post created, activity patterns observed, optimal time selected, post scheduled

Specific_Action: Navigate to groups page, find first group, view group details, leave the group
Target_Elements: .nav-icon[data-page='groups'], group list, group details, leave group button
Success_Criteria: Groups page loaded, group selected, group details viewed, leave action completed
